svg.title: VRAXION Wiki — Consolidation Graph
svg.desc: Full tree of the wiki consolidation plan: 34 original pages consolidating bottom-up into ~9 authoritative hubs across 5 waves.
svg.text: Bottom-up tree: how 34 pages collapse into ~9 authoritative hubs. Each node is a wiki page.

g.text: | solid = active | dashed = planned | green overlay = complete

svg.text: 34 original pages · 29 current · 5 merged · 2 archived · Target ~9 · Feb 2026
